alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 5:13AM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions are expected Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
